content.value:
class FourCal:
  def setdata(self, first, second):
    self.first = first
    self.second = second
    
  def add(self):
    result = self.first + self.second
    return result
  
a = FourCal()
a.setdata(4, 2)
print(a.add()) # 6

# ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•œ ë‹¤ìŒì— ë°”ë¡œ setdataì—†ì´ addë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ê²Œ ë˜ë©´ ì—ëŸ¬ê°€ ë°œìƒí•œë‹¤
# ìƒì„±ìë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ë©´ í•´ê²°ëœë‹¤
def __init__(self, first, second):
  self.first = first
  self.second = second
  
# í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ìƒì†
class MoreFourCal(FourCal):

content.value:
import schedule 
import time 
def job_second(): 
    print("I'm working...every second") 
    
def job_minute(): 
    print("I'm working...every minute") 
    
def job_hour(): 
    print("I'm working...every hour") 
    
def job_day(): 
    print("I'm working...every day") 
    
def job_monday(): 
    print("I'm working...every monday") 
    
def job_wednesday(): 
    print("I'm working...every wednesday") 
    
# # 10ì´ˆì— í•œë²ˆì”© ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every(10).seconds.do(job_second) 

# # 10ë¶„ì— í•œë²ˆì”© ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every(10).minutes.do(job_minute) 

# # ë§¤ ì‹œê°„ ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every().hours.do(job_hour) 

# # ë§¤ì¼ 10:30 ì— ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every().days.at("10:30").do(job_day) 

# # ë§¤ì£¼ ì›”ìš”ì¼ ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every().monday.do(job_monday) 

# # ë§¤ì£¼ ìˆ˜ìš”ì¼ 13:15 ì— ì‹¤í–‰ 
schedule.every().wednesday.at("13:15").do(job_wednesday) 

while True: 
    schedule.run_pending() 
    time.sleep(1)

# ê³µí†µ ê·œì¹™
## common header
```json
{"authorization": "Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN"}
```
## common response model
```json
// success
{
	"result": true,
	"data": data model
}

// fail
{
	"result": false,
	"error": {
		"code": 9999,
		"msg": "unknown"
	}
}
```

# users
## post
### path: users/
#### body
```json
{"sub": "auth0 sub" "nick_name": "name"}
```
#### response data
- User model

## get
### path: users/
#### response data
```json
{"users": [User model]}
```

### path: users/:id
#### response data
- User model

### path: users/me
#### response data
- User model

### path: users/search
#### query
- nick_name
#### response data
```json
{"users": [User model]}
```

### path: users/favorites
#### response data
```json
{"product_ids": Product Id Array}
```

## put
### path: users/me
#### body
```json
{"nick_name": "nick name"}
```

## delete
### path: users/me
#### response data
- null

# products
## post
### path: products/
#### body
```json
{"name": "product name",
"type": 1,
"barcode_id": optional}
```
#### response data
- Product model

## get
### path: products/:id
#### response data
```json
{"product": Product model,
"images": [ProductImage id],
"favorite_count": count}
```

### path: products/barcode/:barcode_id
#### response data
```json
{"product": Product model,
"images": [ProductImage id],
"favorite_count": count}
```

### path: products/
#### query
- page
- per
- name(optional)
#### response data
```json
{"products": [
  {"product": Product model,
  "images": [ProductImage id(ìµœëŒ€ 3ê°œ)]}
]}
```

## put
## delete
### path: products/:id(ì•ˆì”€)
#### response data
- null

# notes
## post
### path: notes/
#### body
```json
{"product_id": "product_id",
"body": "body",
"image_ids": [ProductImage id]}
```
#### response data
- Note model

## get
### path: notes/:id
#### response data
```json
{"note": Note model,
"product": Product model,
"user": User model(Optional),
"images": [ProductImage id]}
```

### path: notes/
#### query
- page
- per
- product_id(optional)
#### response data
```json
{"notes": [
  {"note": Note model,
  "product": Product model,
  "user": User model(Optional),
  "images": [ProductImage id](ìµœëŒ€ 3ê°œ)}
]}
```

### path: notes/user/:id
#### query
- page
- per
#### response data
```json
{"notes": [
  {"note": Note model,
  "product": Product model,
  "user": User model(Optional),
  "images": [ProductImage id](ìµœëŒ€ 3ê°œ)}
]}
```

## put
### path: notes/:id
#### body
- Note model

## delete
### path: notes/:id
#### response data
- null

# images
## post
### path: images/
#### body
```json
{"product_id": product_id(Optional)
"note_id": note_id(Optional)}
```
#### response data
- ProductImage model

## delete
### path: images/:id
#### response data
- null

const int& : ì½ê¸°ì „ìš© ì°¸ì¡°(ì„ì‹œì—ë„ ë°”ì¸ë”©)

int* const : í¬ì¸í„° ìì²´ê°€ const

void by_value(int v) { v = 100; }            // ë³µì‚¬ë³¸ë§Œ ë°”ë€œ
void by_ref(int& v)  { v = 200; }            // ì›ë³¸ì´ ë°”ë€œ

// ë°°ì—´ê³¼ í¬ì¸í„°
int arr[3] = {10,20,30};

std::cout << *p << "\n";  // 10

std::cout << p[2] << "\n";   // 30 (p[2] == *(p+2))
